alert.note: Alert for Cedar (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 02 at 8:31AM CST until March 05 at 2:00PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Sac River near Caplinger Mills affecting Cedar County. .Widespread rainfall accumulations between one and two inches over the lower Sac River Basin will likely cause the Sac River to rise above flood stage early Saturday morning. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT TO EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sac River near Caplinger Mills. * WHEN...From late Friday night to early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, minor Flooding occurs at the gage site. The campground at Caplinger Mills floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CST Thursday the stage was 6.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Saturday morning to a crest of 17.0 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
